name: Everything Hack Windows
description:
Simulation of windows and what it feels like to be hacked. Based on my friends expirence. This hack is based on one file called Everything.EXE and what this

EXE does it keeps installing a copy of itself and it cant be deleted. Then the pc blacks out and goes back to normal. Now what you play is the point of where this True story is right now. You click the X and boom colour, Sizes, So this is why the file was called everything. because it holds everything.

Thank You For Playing - AlfGames11
